name: Missdemanor
description:
Welcome to the manor.

Put on your necklace to unleash the power of lightning, but be careful of the consequences.

Controls

Keyboard:

  • WAD – move
  • S – focus
  • R – restart
  • N – necklace
  • F11 – toggle fullscreen (desktop only)

Alt: arrows/space instead of WASD

Pad:

  • A – jump
  • L2/R2/down – focus
  • Select – restart
  • B/X/Y – necklace

Acknowledgements

Godot 3, Reaper, Vital, Koe recast, this outline shader, this font

Walkthrough

Ending thoughts

I especially love how the SFX turned out. Everything was synthed from scratch during the event (except for step sounds, which where recorded) and I was pretty nervous about it, but it turned out great. Turns out you can make anything out of white noise.
